featureType.name: Global_Fishing_Effort
featureType.title: Global Fishing Effort database (2022)
featureType.abstract:
The data describes number of vessels, engine power, gross tonnage and fishing effort by year (1950-2017), targeted functional group, and fishing gear, for a global fishing effort database. Fishing effort estimates were derived from country-level fishing fleet capacity data publicly available, following the method described in Rousseau et al (2019; https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.1820344116).
The data was collected for a wide range of uses, including to inform global and regional marine ecosystem models and to understand the long-term evolution of fishing and its socio-ecological implications in the global ocean.
This database is current as of 2022 but may be updated in the future with a newer version incorporating user feedback, improved methodology and more recent fishing years.
CSV files, including summary products, can be downloaded from https://data.imas.utas.edu.au/attachments/1241a51d-c8c2-4432-aa68-3d2bae142794
